Entries.spring_Sat: Marnie believed we were in a relationship. Isn't that ridiculous?#$b#I guess some girls really will do anything for attention.
Entries.spring_23: Watching the young folk dance really makes you realize what you're missing.#$b#Oh, sorry @, I guess I'm getting sentimental in my old age.
Entries.fall_9: So, what are you up to tonight, @? Me? I guess I'll enjoy a quiet night at home. Alone.$s
Entries.spring_Sat6: Did I ever really love her? Of course not.$3#$b#Of course not...$2
Entries.summer_Fri6: What have I done for this town, @? Well, many things...#$b#There was... Um... well... Don't you have work to do?$3
Entries.summer_Tue8: Ah, these long summer nights call for moonlight trysts... I guess it was fun while it lasted.
Entries.fall_Fri6: Marnie seems to be getting awfully cozy with that Marlon fellow, don't you think?#$e#Don't be ridiculous, @. I'm not jealous. I'm not!$3
Entries.winter_Sun6: Hi there, @! How're you doing today?#$e#If you see Marnie, tell her I say 'hi'. And I miss her.$2
Entries.winter_Sat8: Ever regretted the decisions you've made, @?#$e#I let my position go to my head... And now everyone's mocking me behind my back.$3
